component.name: GameOutlet
component.summary: Find the best prices on PC games

description.p: The GameOutlet put together the latest deals in games for PC. It puts the deals for the most popular online game stores in one single place. It allows you to easily find the best deals and search for your favorite games

ul.li: See the latest deals from the most popular game stores
Search by a game title to see its prices on these stores
Save your favorite games to a wishlist
See all deals from the online game stores
